name: recruitment-platform
description: A full-stack recruitment platform prototype with user registration, authentication, and profile management

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
